description: Find her some cigarettes to prove you're not a loser.

dialogue.describe: I guess you could use some work, huh? Don't know if I can trust you not to hurt yourself though.
dialogue.offer: Here's a useless shotgun I don't want, show me you aren't completely useless by finding me 8 packs of cigarettes. That's 160 in case you didn't learn math, and swamp cigs don't count because I can make tons of those.
dialogue.accepted: Yeah I got a feeling you'll be back.
dialogue.advice: Ask someone who lives here where they keep the fucking cigs, who do you think I am?
dialogue.success: Wow you actually did it. I guess I have more work for you then, and the rest of the shells.
dialogue.success_lie: I could kill you where you stand, just for the hell of it. Nobody would care if I made you disappear.

description: Find or make 200 codeine pills to prove you're resourceful.

dialogue.describe: You're not useless but that doesn't make you resourceful. Let's see if you can prove me wrong.
dialogue.offer: I ate shit from an RPG to the face a few years ago and I've been in pain since. Take a chemistry set I looted and make me 200 codeine pills from the various plants around here. The recipe is easy. Hospitals probably have it too if you wanna cheat.
dialogue.accepted: We extract a close-enough codeine from poppies with some cairn root and white wound... And what else? Shit.
dialogue.advice: Poppies, cairn root, white wound, maybe some blood grass? Kristen always cooked this stuff up, can't recall the ratios.
dialogue.inquire: Time heals all wounds, EXCEPT MY FUCKING HANDS!
dialogue.success: Hey, this is pretty good. I have one last job. You can have these grenades and my extra electro-wrench.
dialogue.success_lie: I could kill you where you stand, just for the hell of it. Nobody would care if I made you disappear.
dialogue.failure: Yeah I bet you can't even boil water, pussy.

description: Kill 20 reapers to prove your loyalty to the cause.

dialogue.describe: I was just fucking with you for the hell of it with those other jobs. Let's get you some real work.
dialogue.offer: Bag 20 reapers and I'll let you join us. You go through the door boy and it'll be a lot harder. You can cut 'em down however ya want but I'm not taking your word for it. I want their brain chips so better learn to cut 'em up.
dialogue.accepted: Give 'em a great leap forward they won't soon forget. Oh, here's a flamethrower. I'll be watching so put on a good show. If you set yourself on fire I'll be here laughing.
dialogue.advice: If you're a pussy just use a truck or a tank. In all my years I never saw a man survive a truck going 90 kilometers an hour. Put a machine gun on it too, make a technical like those shitboxes in Afghanistan and Syria.
dialogue.success: Good work on that then. I'll give you my card. Show it to the door boy and he'll let you in or I'll kick his ass.
dialogue.success_lie: I could kill you where you stand, just for the hell of it. Nobody would care if I made you disappear.
dialogue.failure: Too much of a pussy to even do it with a truck, huh?

description: Steal the Imperial copy of the Kolibri Project from their Archives.

dialogue.describe: Steal us back the Imperial copy of the Kolibri project.
dialogue.offer: Savant's Archives had a full record of the Kolibri project but we lost it when She was assassinated. We only have an incomplete set I snatched from a rebel. It holds the secrets to hyperspace gates, and a bunch of weapons you'd use.
dialogue.accepted: Lassar will want the whole drive, but it's heavy and I have my doubts you can rip it out of the wall without blowing up. I just need the Kolibri data. If we grab this then the Old Guard can leave the system once they have orbital infrastructure.
dialogue.advice: There will be at least a dozen Arbiters and a Captain. If you don't find a flash drive with the records then you'll have to download them.
dialogue.success: That wasn't too bad I hope. You can have my railgun since we can make more now.
dialogue.success_lie: I could kill you where you stand, just for the hell of it. Nobody would care if I made you disappear.
dialogue.failure: Yeah, that's what I expect out of you.
